title: Kate Ferdinand shares stunning behind the scenes photos from her wedding day with Rio
text:

Kate Ferdinand has shared new photos from behind the scenes at her beautiful wedding to footballer Rio.

The reality star, 27, married 40-year-old Rio last month in a stunning ceremony in Turkey.

Kate has now released some unseen photos from her special day, from behind the scenes.

On her Instagram story, the TOWIE alumni posted a touching photo of her smiling at her new hubbie's daughter Tia, 8.

She captioned the photo "my special princess".

(Image: Instagram)

Kate is now stepmum to Tia as well as Rio's two sons Lorenz, 13, and Tate, 11.

Tia walked down the aisle before Kate on the day, while the boys walked her down the aisle.

Rio told OK! magazine : “I cried as soon as the day started. Seeing Tia walk up the aisle before Kate set me off. It was just so emotional.

(Image: Instagram)

"There was just no going back on the emotion, that’s why I had to keep my shades on!

"Seeing Tate and Lorenz walk Kate down the aisle was particularly poignant and we wouldn’t have wanted to do it any other way.

"They were so proud and they couldn’t wait to do that, they felt important."

(Image: Instagram)

She also posted a photo with her beautiful bridesmaids posing in cream coloured gowns holding up a balloon each that spelt out the word "bride".

Kate captioned the picture: "Thank you for all the special little touches" alongside a heart emoji.

She also posted a photo of her and pal Melissa Wilson in a repost from Melissa's story.

(Image: Instagram)

The two girls lean in to each other and smile, Kate in her gorgeous wedding gown.

She captioned the post: "Love you".

Kate posted videos from the dancefloor at the wedding reception, and it looked like guests were having a bal as they danced to a live performance from Mic Lowry.

(Image: Instagram)

Another snap shows Kate and Rio walking for the first time as husband and wife.

The heartwarming photo shows the couple beaming as they walk towards their guests, alongside the caption "Mr and Mrs".

Kate was walked down the first half of the aisle by her previously estranged dad Phil Wright.

(Image: Instagram)

The electrician celebrated his daughter's big day as he revealed the "amazing wedding" brought him closer to his daughter.

He told The Sun On Sunday : "It was an amazing wedding and I felt very proud.

“There has been a lot of emotion all round . . . it’s been a mad few days.”

(Image: Instagram)

Kate has legally changed her maiden name Wright to Ferdinand after the ceremony.

The newly-weds jetted straight back to the UK as Rio returned to work as a sports pundit.

They didn't slack on their exercise either as the couple hit the gym just four days after their nuptials.
description: Kate Ferdinand has shared some new photos from her wedding day in Turkey
